name: Color Balls (itch) (JustPhilip)
description:
Color Balls v1.0

🔴🟠🟡🔵🟣🟤⚫⚪

Player Movement

Movement 1 : Left and Right Buttons to move left and right and space to jump

Movement 2 : A and D Buttons to move left and right and space to left click

Ball Points 

Yellow and Red balls change the gravity of your player to default

But collecting the gray ball increases gravity, so BEWARE

All other balls only add points according to their colors, but no addition or subtraction to the gravity

In Outer Space 

In outer space your gravity is at the lowest it can be

The Diagonals

The diagonals at the top of the screen is a limit and going there ENDS THE GAME

Mini Game Jam Project

by Philip
